summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 4, Cove Addition, being the alley from West McGraw Street to West Boston Street; between 2nd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9880 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
